attributes.action: Force manufacturers to limit packaging on their products and make it biodegradable or recyclable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having almost filled my small kitchen bin with just 4 items of packaging I feel compelled to say, if the government are going to impose fines on families, then they must make the manufacturers address their responsibility in creating the packaging that needs to be disposed off somewhere. Bottles and boxes only half full and unecessary use of plastic wrappers must be outlawed. Let us all refuse the bags we do not need and carry environmentally friendly bags with us when shopping
